notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This research was funded by the State Key Laboratory of Veterinary Biotechnology Foundation, grant no. SKLVBF201908; the Heilongjiang Province Postdoctoral Science Foundation, grant no. LBH-Q17139/LBH-Z18259; the Program for Young Scholars with Creative Talents in Heilongjiang Bayi Agricultural University, grant no. CXRC2017005; the Natural Science Foundation of Heilongjiang Province, grant no. C2016043; the graduate students research foundation of Heilongjiang Bayi Agricultural University, grant no. YJSCX2019-Y33 and the National Natural Science Foundation of China, grant no. 31472209/31873011.
